trans-unit.source: Specifies the behaviors of a link in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>.
Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此枚举的成员设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>的值

trans-unit.source: The link always displays with underlined text.
trans-unit.target: 链接将始终显示带下划线的文字。

trans-unit.source: The link displays underlined text only when the mouse is hovered over the link text.
trans-unit.target: 仅当鼠标悬停在链接文本时，则链接将显示带下划线的文本。

trans-unit.source: The link text is never underlined.
trans-unit.target: 链接文本从不带下划线。

trans-unit.source: The link can still be distinguished from other text by use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 链接仍从其他文本通过使用区分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor*>属性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor*>

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this setting depends on the options set using the Internet Options dialog box in Control Panel or Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 此设置的行为取决于使用控制面板或 Internet 资源管理器中的 Internet 选项对话框设置的选项。
